data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Maricao, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maricao, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Maricao, Puerto Rico. Please, stir the 1,788 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Maricao, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Maricao, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Maricao
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Maricao, Maricao, Puerto Rico.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Maricao against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Maricao.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Maricao, Puerto Rico has a population of 5,500.

We estimate Maricao has 1,788 people who might know Jesus, 3,412 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 300 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 1,788 believers in Maricao.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me
